page.title: 12RUN DOWN BUILDINGS MUNDON
page.content: Driving down{Vicarage Lane},a narrow winding overgrown track, first you pass the rundown{old village school. Then you come to{Mundon Hall},a large white farm house surrounded by fields full of cows.Walking up a muddy track,by{Mundon Hall moat pond,}round the corner you see, almost hidden by overgrowth, the disused church of st.Mary's. Entering the door of the wooden tower,you look up and see many old wooden beams.In the church it is obvious that someone cares.{"The {friends of the church,"}are restoring it slowly in their spare time.The family pews with their wooden doors are complete.
